channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Fortify Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Fortify Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2107|2024-08-04T07:01:39.791Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20fortify%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Fortify Plugin 19.1.29 and earlier stores proxy server passwords unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.
